DeleteLexicon.name: DeleteLexicon
DeleteLexicon.description: Grants permission to delete the specified pronunciation lexicon stored in an AWS Region

DescribeVoices.name: DescribeVoices
DescribeVoices.description: Grants permission to describe the list of voices that are available for use when requesting speech synthesis

GetLexicon.name: GetLexicon
GetLexicon.description: Grants permission to retrieve the content of the specified pronunciation lexicon stored in an AWS Region

GetSpeechSynthesisTask.name: GetSpeechSynthesisTask
GetSpeechSynthesisTask.description: Grants permission to get information about specific speech synthesis task

ListLexicons.name: ListLexicons
ListLexicons.description: Grants permission to list the pronunciation lexicons stored in an AWS Region

ListSpeechSynthesisTasks.name: ListSpeechSynthesisTasks
ListSpeechSynthesisTasks.description: Grants permission to list requested speech synthesis tasks

PutLexicon.name: PutLexicon
PutLexicon.description: Grants permission to store a pronunciation lexicon in an AWS Region

StartSpeechSynthesisTask.name: StartSpeechSynthesisTask
StartSpeechSynthesisTask.description: Grants permission to synthesize long inputs to the provided S3 location
